tasks.objective: Corroborate distress posture and ownership/legal status across independent sources.
acceptanceCriteria: At least 2 independent source systems corroborate current distress status.
Owner and parcel identifiers resolve with confidence.

tasks.objective: Verify utility and facility capability requirements for expansion fit.
acceptanceCriteria: Utility and facility specs confirmed with source links or broker confirmation.
Each missing capability is marked pass/fail for current and next profile.
